name: Tanat Boozayaazgool
body:
### Current Projects

**Blank Canvas**
A 2D platformer game created in C# and XNA which features a protagonist trying to restore the vibrancy of a color-deprived world.
Status: In Progress

**Project: Force**
Inspired by the Star Wars universe, this project combines an Arduino and a glove to create a wireless mouse as an alternative to playing video games in style.
Status: In Progress

**Building Relationships**
Built on RenPy, Building Relationships is a dating simulator for buildings with a very quirky personality.
Status: In Progress

### About Me

![Tanat B.](https://github.com/ttanatb/ttanatb.github.io/blob/master/images/me.jpg)

- Writer at [Electronic Gaming Federation](http://media.egfederation.com/)

- Student at Rochester Institute of Technology, BS in Game Design and Development

[GitHub](https://github.com/ttanatb/) - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ttanatb) - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ttanatb)
